staticText.text: Received and accepted in satisfactory condition the goods specified on this delivery receipt and conformed with the conditions of the delivery.
1. Unless otherwise stated, this delivery has not yet been paid by the buyer.
2. Accepted merchandise cannot be returned and/ or exchanged.
3. The parties agree to submit themselves to the jurisdiction of any courts in the Papua New Guinea at the discretion of the seller.
D E L I V E R Y R E C E I P T
